messages.subject: Re: leestore@webtv.net
messages.msgSnippet: Ya know, that is interesting as there was just a cop on Wheel of Fortune who said that he works nights so he can homeschool his kids during the day. He was
messages.messageBody:
Ya know, that is interesting as there was just a cop on Wheel of Fortune
who said that he works nights so he can homeschool his kids during the day.
He was from Mass.

But, on to the help part. There is or was a list on the HEM boards for
homeschooling working parents. You might try there for some suggestions,
etc.

Lynda

----------
From: "Frank Fetzko Jr." <corkman@...>

Just a small request...I am a single mom who relies HEAVILY on this list
for support. I also work full time. I get up early to read the wonderful
question/answers that everyone has. I also gain a mile long list of
ideas from you. Please don't let Pokemon rule the list, I'm fully aware
of their existence but I would really prefer ideas on how to keep my
unschooled children unschooled!
Aleasa

Hope I am doing this right... I have been subscribed and have been reading
but haven't posted yet... I have subscribed to the "digest" version so I am
afraid to reply to the email as I'm afraid it will include all 30 or so
messages on the digest....

Aleasa, excuse me for butting in but HOW do you work full time and
unschool? I would appreciate any tips you have ... I am unschooling my 14
year old but I am working nights and things aren't that smooth ... I am
being laid off Jan 29th so I am excited about that and will be working for
myself ... but these next two weeks are still a killer ... smile.. .thanks
for your time!

Susan


Message boards, timely articles, a free newsletter and more!
Check it all out at: http://www.unschooling.com
